text: Liu Ping-wei (; 30 November 1952 â€“ 21 April 2020) was a Taiwanese politician. He was first elected to the Taiwan Provincial Assembly in 1981 until 1998. Liu was speaker of the provincial assembly between 1994 and 1998. For a single term, he was a member of the Legislative Yuan from 1999 to 2002. Liu was born in Banqiao, Taipei County. Liu died of oral cancer in Banqiao on 21 April 2020, aged 67. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from oral cancer Category:Taiwanese politicians
title: Liu Ping-wei
